entry.title: New release for Docmost: v0.7.0
entry.content:
Highlights

  • Language translations
  • German
  • French
  • Portuguese (BR)
  • Chinese
  • Support for pasting markdown
  • Google Sheets embed
  • Multiple improvements to the editor

What's Changed

  • Support I18n by @lleohao in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/243
  • feat: support pasting markdown by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/606
  • fix: link paste handler by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/609
  • feat: add new languages to selection by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/626
  • feat: google sheets embed by @hoiekim in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/615
  • New Crowdin updates by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/630
  • Fix: Ensure only one emoji list appears by @omarNaifer12 in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/572
  • fix: add cancel button for editing comments by @omarNaifer12 in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/580
  • fix: editor improvements by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/583
  • fix: punycode DeprecationWarning error by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/631

New Contributors

  • @lleohao made their first contribution in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/243
  • @hoiekim made their first contribution in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/615
  • @omarNaifer12 made their first contribution in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/572

Special thanks to @lleohao, @leonardomaglia, @devzwf, @CodeZhangBorui, andreppedroza, digitalindependant, sssaw and @marquesine for help with translations.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/docmost/docmost/compare/v0.6.2...v0.7.0

entry.title: New release for Docmost: v0.8.0
entry.content:
Highlights

  • Internal page links (@ command)
  • User mentions (@ command)
  • Editor text alignment
  • New language translations (es-ES, it-IT, ja-JP, ko-KR, ru-RU)
  • Members search
  • UI paginations
  • Numerous bug fixes and improvements

PS: No notification for user mentions yet, but this will be addressed in a future release.

Breaking changes

For better security, we have enforced a minimum of 32-character APP_SECRET length. If your APP_SECRET length is less, please make sure to update it before upgrading. You can generate a new key with openssl rand -hex 32.

What's Changed

  • chore: update katex version by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/658
  • refactor: switch to HttpOnly cookie by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/660
  • fix 401 redirect in auth routes by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/674
  • Fix invitation signup redirect by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/690
  • fix: default language on invitation signup by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/691
  • fix: switch space bug by @fuscodev in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/692
  • fix client side env variable refresh by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/695
  • feat: add text alignment by @fuscodev in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/667
  • New Crowdin updates by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/659
  • New language options (es-ES, it-IT, ja-JP, ko-KR, ru-RU) by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/701
  • fix code block tab-size and printing by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/703
  • fix: enforce 32-character minimum length for APP_SECRET by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/702
  • Fix: Close Popover When Clicking Outside in SwitchSpace Component by @auxa-m45 in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/720
  • feat: UI pagination and members search by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/724
  • feat: internal page links and mentions by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/604
  • chore(deps): update dependencies by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/729
  • feat: space member search by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/731

New Contributors

  • @fuscodev made their first contribution in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/692
  • @auxa-m45 made their first contribution in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/720

Full Changelog: https://github.com/docmost/docmost/compare/v0.7.0...v0.8.0

entry.title: New release for Docmost: v0.8.2
entry.content:
Invited users who signed up between version 0.8.0 and 0.8.1 may encounter login issues due to passwords being hashed twice. To resolve this, they will need to reset their password.

What's Changed

  • fix: accept invitation password hashing by @h4rb4rd in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/773
  • upgrade to NestJS 11 by @Philipinho in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/766
  • Pin S3 SDK version to 3.701.0 due to https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-js-v3/issues/6810.

New Contributors

  • @h4rb4rd made their first contribution in https://github.com/docmost/docmost/pull/773

Full Changelog: https://github.com/docmost/docmost/compare/v0.8.1...v0.8.2
